verses.name: Genesis 27:44
verses.text: And tarry with him a few days, until thy brother’s fury turn away;

verses.name: Genesis 27:45
verses.text: Until thy brother’s anger turn away from thee, and he forget that which thou hast done to him: then I will send, and fetch thee from thence: why should I be deprived also of you both in one day?

verses.name: Genesis 27:46
verses.text: And Rebekah said to Isaac, I am weary of my life because of the daughters of Heth: if Jacob take a wife of the daughters of Heth, such as these which are of the daughters of the land, what good shall my life do me?
